data.actual_result: You cannot scroll up, making the search virtually impossible to do so.
data.expected_result: You should be able to scroll up to search for your friend.
data.short_description: When you rotate your screen on the new invite model, you cannot scroll up to search for your friend.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server (This is just to easily get to the new invite model). - In your "general" channel, you should see "invite your friends" option. Click on it. - Rotate your screen, and try to search for your friends.
